review: I now have two of these are they are really a good buy.
author: Jack D Lazard

review: C'est un excellent produit ! Marche parfaitement, très utile par exemple pour pouvoir regarder Netflix ou d'autres services sur la télé.
author: Maria Jose Guerrero

review: You have to have a little knowledge in how to set this up. Even though it looks easy and it is, sometimes I ran into trouble getting it to work at first. But by plugging in the usb cord that came with it into the TV for more power, it started working.  Great product for streaming. The gold plate was bent for me after moving the thing a few times. It also sticks out like a sore thumb. Hard to hide when you have wires running around it. I hope theres also a better general streaming option for videos on the desktop.
author: EASY
